se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Class LinearTuningParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.LinearTuningParameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoProvider, IterationListener, TuningParameter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearProposerWeight

    public class LinearTuningParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TuningParameter, IterationListener
    Represents a TuningParameter which increases or decreases linearly with the iteration number.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
